verses.text: \w Again|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H5810"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w shelters|strong="H4492"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w caves|strong="H4631"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w strongholds|strong="H4679"\w*.

\w Whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w plant|strong="H2232"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* crops, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* other \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w invade|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w encamping|strong="H2583"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroying|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w produce|strong="H2981"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sustenance|strong="H4241"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Midianites \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* tents \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* swarm \w of|strong="H4557"\w* locusts. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w innumerable|strong="H4557"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w entered|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w ravage|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w impoverished|strong="H1809"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*,

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* told \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w oppressors|strong="H3905"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w drove|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \f + \fr 6:10 \ft Or worship\f* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* gods \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Amorites, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* whose land \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*.’ \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w Me|strong="H6963"\w*.” The Call of Gideon

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 6:11 \ft Or Angel; also in verses 12, 20, 21, and 22; corresponding pronouns may also be capitalized.\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* oak \f + \fr 6:11 \ft Or terebinth or great tree; also in verse 19\f* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Abiezrite, \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w threshing|strong="H2251"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w winepress|strong="H1660"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w hide|strong="H5127"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Gideon \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*.”

“Please, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* replied, “\w if|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w happened|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, saying, ‘\w Has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?’ \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \f + \fr 6:14 \ft LXX The angel of the LORD or The Angel of the LORD; also in verse 16\f* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*. \w Am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*?”

“Please, \w my|strong="H3467"\w* Lord,” Gideon replied, “\w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Indeed|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H3467"\w* clan \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* weakest \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6810"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.”

“\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* man.”

Gideon \w answered|strong="H1696"\w*, “If \w I|strong="H4672"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Your|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H3240"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*.” \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*.\f + \fr 6:19 \ft An ephah is approximately 20 dry quarts or 22 liters (probably about 25.5 pounds or 11.6 kilograms of flour).\f* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w broth|strong="H4839"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pot|strong="H6517"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w present|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Him|strong="H6213"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* oak.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* God \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w lay|strong="H3240"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w broth|strong="H4839"\w*.” \w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H8210"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w extended|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tip|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* fire flared \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* consumed \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w vanished|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w realized|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, “Oh \w no|strong="H7200"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*, “\w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”
